incredibly well made game some of the most fun ive had with a platformer the moveset you get while traversing the world really makes you feel like a ninja it gets very difficult and sometimes frustrating but it makes it so satisfying when you finally get through the story is a lot of fun the music is fantastic and the aesthetic is very pleasing getting every achievement can be a real nightmare but by the end you become a sidescrolling ninja master

good art  long winded optional conversations were funny at first bur got annoying  if you want a punishing precision platformer this is it  some checkpoints you will have half health and hope you hit something to get a heal if you dont one spike will kill you falling into the void is insta death  if you want a challenge sure play it

the messenger is a great game by itself the basegame is awesome even though very punishing while the twists on gameplay and meta humor are awesome if you enjoy metroidvanias or ninja gaiden youll enjoy this game  however the dlc that is free admittedly is an embarrassment in comparison to the base game it feels clunky overly punishing and not polished if you want about 1520 hours of good gameplay you will enjoy this

the story and dialogue in this game had me laughing out loud and trying to 100 this has been a blast the picnic panic dlc was also great with several nods to classics i grew up playing  some reviews seem to complain about spoilerthe game dragging after the metroidvania mechanics reveal themselvesspoiler but thats when the game really hooked me  definitely check it out if you like games like shovel knight hollow knight nes ninja gaiden etc

excellent starter to the metroidvania genre lots of humor and simple mechanics with some skill expression also not a particularly challenging metroidvania and its easy to tell when you can progress a part of the map because of the way the player abilities work

this game is superb the art is amazing it replicates the nes look without looking like garbage and the combat and platforming is so fun you really feel like a ninja once you get good at the games and can do bosses nohit which isnt hard to learn to do and the platforming is precise but not unfair 1010 you need to buy it now immediately it works perfect on linux with proton i use experimental btw as a bonus

i picked up this game as i was captivated by its pixel art style i fell in love with the funny story and very quick gameplay i recommend this game for anyone looking for an engaging platformer and fun story

the messenger is a certified baller platformer its got super tight controls a great artstyle especially with the timetravelling switch ups superbly good music and a whole bunch of cool abilities it can be tough to get fully into the rhythm of some of the tougher areas but once you do it feels so damn good to blast straight through enemies and platforming challenges absolutely recommend
